system.description:
This spell summons a single 16 Hit Dice elemental to obey the druidâ€™s commands.

Effects:

  • The caster may summon one elemental per casting (air, earth, fire, or water).
  • A druid may only summon one of each elemental type per day.
  • The elemental will understand spoken commands and will obey them within its abilities.
  • No concentration is needed to control the elemental.
  • The druid may dismiss the elemental at will, returning it to its home plane.
  • A dispel magic or dispel evil spell will also send the elemental back.
